name: ProgressRoot
description:
Groups all parts of the progress bar and provides the task completion status to screen readers.
Renders a `<div>` element.

value.description: The current value. The component is indeterminate when value is `null`.

aria-valuetext.description: A string value that provides a user-friendly name for `aria-valuenow`, the current value of the meter.

getAriaValueText.type: ((formattedValue: string | null, value: number | null) => string)
getAriaValueText.description: Accepts a function which returns a string value that provides a human-readable text alternative for the current value of the progress bar.
getAriaValueText.detailedType:
| ((
    formattedValue: string | null,
    value: number | null,
  ) => string)
| undefined

locale.description:
The locale used by `Intl.NumberFormat` when formatting the value.
Defaults to the user's runtime locale.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
render.detailedType:
| ReactElement
| ((
    props: HTMLProps,
    state: ProgressRootState,
  ) => ReactElement)

data-complete.description: Present when the progress has completed.

data-indeterminate.description: Present when the progress is in interminate state.

data-progressing.description: Present while the progress is progressing.
